Siconos Help and Documentation.

For all documentation and help see https://gforge.inria.fr/projects/siconos/

There you can find:

  • forum (https://gforge.inria.fr/forum/?group_id=9)

  • bug trackers (https://gforge.inria.fr/tracker/?group_id=9)

  • mailing lists (https://gforge.inria.fr/mail/?group_id=9)

  • Doxygen auto-generated documentation for Numerics (http://siconos.gforge.inria.fr/Documentation/Numerics_Doxygen/) and Kernel (http://siconos.gforge.inria.fr/Documentation/Kernel_Doxygen/index.html).

  • An overview of the Siconos European project (http://siconos.gforge.inria.fr/docDev/index.html)

  • A detailed design description (http://siconos.gforge.inria.fr/docDev/design.html)

  • A basic software development methodology (http://siconos.gforge.inria.fr/docDev/sdm.html)

  • A short overview of the Software design (http://siconos.gforge.inria.fr/Documentation/SiconosOverview/CapriSept2006.pdf)

Available Manuals:

  • Siconos Installation Guide: how to download, install the platform, what are the required libraries ...

  • Getting Started with Siconos: a short tutorial on how to use Siconos and write your own samples in C++ or Python.

  • Siconos User Manual: fully detailed description of all the Siconos functionalities (based on Doxygen)

  • Siconos Theory Manual (in progress, not yet available)
